overview: The journalist of the project and the author of the film "I Killed" Katya Fomina managed to recreate in detail the events during the occupation of the village of Andreevka, Kyiv region. She was also able to record a video interview with Russian servicemen of the 64th Motorized Rifle Brigade, who were directly involved in crimes in the occupied territories - Dmitry Danilov and Daniil Frolkin.
title: I Killed
